control.name: Link
control.helpHtml: A simple control that allows you to set whether to go to a different page on your app or a different, pre-existing URL. An option for opening the link in a new tab is also available.

property.name: Name
property.helpHtml: Name that can be given to the control. Names are used to help identify controls uniquely.

property.name: Text
property.helpHtml: Sets the text of the link.

property.name: Type
property.helpHtml: Sets the type of link. Page link to other pages on your Rapid app and url links to any webpage placed in the text field.

property.name: Page
property.helpHtml: Dropdown for selecting the page in your Rapid app that will be linked to.

property.name: URL
property.helpHtml: Sets the page that will be followed when the user clicks on the link.

property.name: New tab
property.helpHtml: Sets the link opening in a new tab or in the same tab.

control.saveJavaScript: // this is required to get the details of controls that appear after this one as they would not have been present the first time rebuildHtml(this);
